Module com.example.addressbook
Package com.example.addressbook.model

Class ContactManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.addressbook.model.ContactManager
public class ContactManager extends Object
A class that manages the operations of contacts in the address book. It uses an instance of IContactDAO to perform CRUD operations on contacts.
